fields.name: title
fields.description: title of the press release, interview, or speech

fields.name: contributor
fields.description: names of people and organisations contributing to this item; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: date
fields.description: date when this item was presented or published; ISO format 'YYYY-MM-DD'

fields.name: description
fields.description: usually includes the beginning of the full text content (truncated at approx 200 characters)

fields.name: type
fields.description: type of resource, eg 'Press Release' or 'Speech'; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: format
fields.description: format of resource, usually either 'Online Text' or empty; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: work_type
fields.description: Trove work format, eg 'Article'; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: language
fields.description: language of resource, eg 'eng'; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: extent
fields.description: often includes the number of pages; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: rights
fields.description: information about copyright; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: subject
fields.description: subject or topic headings; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: is_part_of
fields.description: collection containing this item; multiple values separated by | symbol

fields.name: fulltext_url
fields.description: Link to the full text version in ParlInfo

fields.name: trove_url
fields.description: link to the version record in Trove

fields.name: hash
fields.description: SHA-1 hash value generated from the full text; useful for identifying duplicate texts
